entry.title: UCC offers credit monitoring after network breach
entry.summary: WINCHESTER — While there has been no evidence of misuse of personal data, Umpqua Community College is offering free credit monitoring for students and staff following “unusual activity on the UCC network” last month.

entry.title: Navigation Center guests coming indoors
entry.summary: The beds are in place, the bathrooms are spotless and the kitchen shelves are stocked with bags of rice and beans, as the Gary Leif Navigation Center in Roseburg is now ready to provide indoor housing to the homeless.
